Back from a Pennsy wedding and Alaskan honeymoon.

2006 August 27th by Administrator

This beautiful lady and i said ‘I do’ on August 12th in New Hope, PA. On August 13th we set out for Alaska.

Needless to say, i haven’t been around a computer for two weeks… looking forward to coding with a ring on.
